cause.description:
Ethan Powell is a six month old infant that was diagnosed with Leukemia in Febuary. He and his parents Ben and Becky Powell have been through alot and we just want to raise awareness for Ethan as this young child fights Leukemia. HE NEEDS YOUR PRAYERS. Pray for healing and for his family, and if you would like the help the family in anyway or just want some more information about Ethan Powell just vist his website. His story is inspiring. www.ethanpowell.com
If you would like to donate to the Powell family send your checks to the following address:
University Church of Christ 2045 E 70th St Shreveport, La 71105
Make checks payable to University Church of Christ and write Ethan Powell in the memo.
God Bless
1. Bringing others to Christ
2. Recruting Prayer Warriors
3. Raising Awareness for Ethan and for Leukemia
cause.name: Ethan Powell
